about_me_text: Vitor Comin, 22 years old, is passionate about technology and finds in it a universe of possibilities that inspires him to dream and grow. With dedication and motivation, he strives to continuously develop himself, viewing each challenge as an opportunity to move forward even more. His love for what he does and his constant desire for growth are the driving forces behind his commitment and dedication every day.
education: Bachelor's degree in Information Systems, UNIVILLE (9th semester out of 9).

weather_radar_description: Basic Front-End personal project consuming the OpenWeatherAPI public API, with responsiveness, CSS transitions, automated tests, code architecture, and more.
cimefer_group_description: Professional and responsive landing page for Cimefer Group, developed in WordPress.
simple_kanban_description: Personal Front-End project of a simple Kanban for task management, using the react-dnd-kit library for drag and drop. Project focused on desktop because it is the library's specialty.
wms_portal_description: Front-End project of a WMS platform using the Angular framework with the PO UI component library. Also using a Mock API (mockapi.io) to perform CRUD operations.
